scripts.test: cross-env NIGHTWATCH_ENV=google_secure node node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js --tags @test1 --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/steps-definitions -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.saucelabs:test: cross-env NIGHTWATCH_ENV=saucelabs_test node  node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js --tags @test1 --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/steps-definitions -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.debug: node --inspect node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/steps-definitions -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty -f json:reports/cucumber_report.json
